title: Matt Hancock – 2018 Speech at the CBI Annual Chinese New Year Dinner
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Matt Hancock, the Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport, at the CBI Annual Chinese New Year Dinner on 22 February 2018.
